text: Mary Jean "Lily" Tomlin (born September 1, 1939) is an American actress, writer and a comedian. She has had a large effect on American comedy since the late 1960s. Her career has involved movies, Broadway stage acts and television. She has won many awards, including an Emmy, a Grammy and a Tony Award. Tomlin was born in Detroit, Michigan. She is openly lesbian and has been with her partner Jane Wagner for over 40 years. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * Category:Actors from Detroit Category:American LGBT writers Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:Comedians from Detroit Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Lesbians Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT comedians Category:Mark Twain Prize recipients Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:Writers from Detroit Category:1939 births Category:Living people
title: Lily Tomlin
